snippet: Whether they've fought on beaches in the Pacific islands, the mountains of Afghanistan or the many other places our military has traveled over the last century, all veterans have felt the connection of war.
abstract: Whether they've fought on beaches in the Pacific islands, the mountains of Afghanistan or the many other places our military has traveled over the last century, all veterans have felt the connection of war.
